name: Wings on Fire
description:
Are you ready to burn your wings? Your mission is simple: Bomb the enemy base!
But do you have what it takes to reach there?
Wings on Fire invites you to an endless challenge you have never seen before!

FEATURES:
- Play for free
- Fly in stunning endless 3D environments
- Choose among various planes
- Complete missions, level up and promote ranks
- Challenge your friends and beat their high scores
- Fight against powerful bosses
- Upgrade your plane and abilities
- Climb online leaderboards
- iOS7 controller support
- Cloud support
- New contents and features with ongoing updates

Wings on Fire brings new aspects to endless runner games by combining role playing elements. Come join to our world and confront the enemy right now!

Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

WATCH TRAILER
